alert.note: Alert for Edwards; Kinney; Val Verde (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 28 at 6:41PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Kinney, southwestern Edwards and southeastern Val Verde Counties through 730 PM CDT... At 640 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles west of Rocksprings to 8 miles east of Carta Valley to 6 miles southeast of Seminole Canyon State Park. Movement was south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Del Rio, Rocksprings, Comstock, Loma Alta, Lake View, Amistad Acres, Carta Valley, Cienegas Terrace, Amistad Village, Black Brush Point, Seminole Canyon State Park, Box Canyon, Val Verde Park, Diablo East, Governors Landing, Long Point, Laughlin AFB, Pecos River Boat Ramp, Kickapoo Cavern State Park, and 277 South Boat Ramp. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
